pullrequest.title: Add schematic view to model editor

content.raw:
1 & 2. It looks much better now centralized. Just a little detail though, if you open a complex model like the PR2 and then delete most of the links, the schematic view seems to maintain its scrollable size with a lot of empty space on the right and bottom and all the remaining links on the top-left. Also, the size seems to be remembered if you leave the editor and enter again with a completely new model.

4- Way to reproduce: I created many joints between two links (6 or 7), then deleted one of the links - the link box disappears but the joint lines remain.
